services.description1: Auto generate flashcards to study with given the notes.
services.description2: Auto transcribe voice into text from lecture through audio.
services.description3: Scrape text from lecture notes such as PowerPoint, PDF, Microsoft Words, text files, and Google Docs.

pricing_plans.description1: The basic subscription costs $0 and its features are basic note conversion, limited flashcards, and standard support

pricing_plans.description2: The pro subscription costs $2.99 and its features are unlimited note conversion, advanced flashcard features, and priority support
